title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 47 - New York State Health Service Corps/obstetric And Pediatric Practitioner Incentive Demonstration Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 47 - New York State Health Service Corps/obstetric And Pediatric Practitioner Incentive Demonstration Program

State Regulations

Subpart 47-1 - New York State Health Service Corps (§ 47-1.1 to 47-1.9)

Subpart 47-2 - Obstetric And Pediatric Practitioner Incentive Demonstration Program (§ 47-2.1 to 47-2.6)

Subpart 47-3 - Designation Of Underserved Areas (§ 47-3.1)

Subpart 47-4 - Resident Loan Repayment Program (§ 47-4.1 to 47-4.8)

Subpart 47-5 - Physician Loan Repayment Program (§ 47-5.1 to 47-5.8)

Subpart 47-6 - Primary Care Practitioner Scholarship Program (§ 47-6.1 to 47-6.9)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 47

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§231, 232, 233, 901, 903, 904, 2506

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
